title: Along the Garden Path
description: Along the Garden Path is a Young Adult novel which takes place in outside of Washington, D.C., in McLean Virginia. 17 Year old Addison Erhard dreams of becoming a world-traveling journalist. She meets Mason Gentry, who wants nothing more than to manage his family's large farm in Marshall, Virginia. These two develop an unlikely relationship as they explore who they want to become. Everything is going well, until a friend of theirs is a victim of a hit-and-run accident. Addison uses her journalistic know-how to uncover the truth. What she discovers is more than she bargained for.
author: Charlotte Peyton
